title: ApprovalTests are failing on 2.1.0
body:
```diff
6: Running approvals against executable:
6:   /home/brain/Projects/fedora/rpms/catch/Catch2-2.1.0/build/SelfTest
6: 
6: console.std:
6:   Results matched
6: 
6: 
6: console.sw:
6: --- console.sw.approved.txt
6: 
6: +++ console.sw.unapproved.txt
6: 
6: -  REQUIRE( INFINITY == Approx(INFINITY) )
6: +  REQUIRE( (__builtin_inff ()) == Approx((__builtin_inff ())) )
6: -  REQUIRE( INFINITY == Approx(INFINITY) )
6: +  REQUIRE( (__builtin_inff ()) == Approx((__builtin_inff ())) )
6:   
6: ****************************
6:   Results differed
6: 
6: 
6: console.swa4:
6:   Results matched
6: 
6: 
6: junit.sw:
6:   Results matched
6: 
6: 
6: xml.sw:
6: --- xml.sw.approved.txt
6: 
6: +++ xml.sw.unapproved.txt
6: 
6: -          INFINITY == Approx(INFINITY)
6: +          (__builtin_inff ()) == Approx((__builtin_inff ()))
6: -          INFINITY == Approx(INFINITY)
6: +          (__builtin_inff ()) == Approx((__builtin_inff ()))
6:   
6: ****************************
6:   Results differed
6: 
6: 
6: compact.sw:
6: --- compact.sw.approved.txt
6: 
6: +++ compact.sw.unapproved.txt
6: 
6: -Approx.tests.cpp:<line number>: passed: INFINITY == Approx(INFINITY) for: inff == Approx( inf )
6: +Approx.tests.cpp:<line number>: passed: (__builtin_inff ()) == Approx((__builtin_inff ())) for: inff == Approx( inf )
6: -Approx.tests.cpp:<line number>: passed: INFINITY == Approx(INFINITY) for: inff == Approx( inf )
6: +Approx.tests.cpp:<line number>: passed: (__builtin_inff ()) == Approx((__builtin_inff ())) for: inff == Approx( inf )
6:   
6: ****************************
6:   Results differed
6: 
6: If these differences are expected, run approve.py to approve new baselines.
6/6 Test #6: ApprovalTests ....................***Failed  Error regular expression found in output. Regex=[Results differed]  0.41 sec
```

This is using v2.1.0 tarball on Fedora Rawhide (x86_64).
